entities.name: quidditch world cup
entities.description: The name of the tournament mentioned in the text.

entities.name: leprechauns
entities.description: A team participating in the Quidditch World Cup, mentioned as forming the words 'HEE, HEE, HE E'.

entities.name: bulgarians
entities.description: A team participating in the Quidditch World Cup, mentioned as having arguments with Mostafa.

entities.name: mostafa
entities.description: The name of a person who is a referee or official at the Quidditch World Cup, mentioned as giving penalties to Ireland and telling Bulgarians to get flying again.

entities.name: ireland
entities.description: A team participating in the Quidditch World Cup, mentioned as receiving two penalties.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: The name of a person who is announcing the game and giving updates on the play.

entities.name: volkov
entities.description: A Beater for Bulgaria, mentioned as swinging his club violently through the air.

entities.name: vulchanov
entities.description: A Beater for Bulgaria, mentioned as swinging his club violently through the air.

entities.name: di mitrov
entities.description: A player for Bulgaria, mentioned as shooting straight at Moran.

entities.name: moran
entities.description: The name of a person who has the Quaffle and is being shot at by Di Mitrov.

entities.name: troy
entities.description: A player mentioned as taking the Quaffle.

relationships.description: Mostafa scolds Bulgarians for not flying again.
Bagman announces that Ireland received two penalties.
Volkov attacks the Bludger with his club.
Vulchanov attacks a human with his club.
Di Mitrov shoots straight at Moran, nearly knocking her off her broom.
